page.title: 10PERFORMING ARTS IN WETHERAL
page.content: There aren't many arts in this area.There is one that we know of.This is {PUPPETEERING}.{MR S. PARKER}is the puppeteer.He takes his puppets around the world.He teaches people how to make and perform with puppets. If we wanted to go to the {CINEMA}we would go to CARLISLE.The {SANDS {CENTRE}is one of the attractions in CARLISLE.It has sports facilities and is used to stage concerts. There are also {PUBS}with live entertainment in this area.One of them is {LANGLEY HALL.}A Traditional Jazz Club meets at the Coach House. Most go out of the area for Theatre etc,to Newcastle, Carlisle, Keswick, Grizedale,etc.
